assetProfile.address2: Khalid Bin Al-Waleed Street Sharq PO Box 2232, Safat
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: United Real Estate Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate investment and development activities in the Middle East and North Africa region. It operates through Rental Operations, Hospitality Operations, Property Trading, Contracting and Services, and Real Estate Development segments. The company engages in the development, leasing, purchase, and resale of real estate properties, as well as manages third party properties; and owning, selling, and acquiring real estate properties and lands. Its property portfolio includes retail complexes, hotels, residential properties, and office buildings. The company also provides hospitality services through Marina Hotel, Hilton Hotel, Bhamdoun Hotel, and Salalah Residence. In addition, it offers agriculture, touristic development, technical, and building services, as well as facilities management services, such as maintenance, cleaning, and security services; owns, sells, and acquires stocks and bonds of real estate companies; prepares studies and provides real estate advisory services; and carries-out maintenance works of buildings and real estate properties, such as  civil, mechanical and electrical works, elevators and air conditioning works, and other related maintenance works. Further, the company engages in owning, managing, operating, investing, leasing, and renting hotels, clubs, motels, entertainment houses, rest places, gardens, parks, exhibitions, restaurants, cafes, residential compounds, touristic and health spas, entertainment and sports facilities and stores; organizing real estate exhibitions; holding real estate bids; and owning commercial markets and residential compounds. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait. United Real Estate Company K.S.C.P. is a subsidiary of Kuwait Projects Company Holding K.S.C.P.
